description: The daughter of the Houjouin company and rivals Arima which leads her to dislike Teppei when he first arrives at Shuuhou Academy. She is the `Club Representative` of the `Society Club` at Shuuhou Academy and reserves the right to enroll students in the club only those whom she thinks have what it takes to be eligible for membership of the school`s most extravagance club. Outside school, she is a very popular model and at the same time one of the most gifted young fashion designers in entire Japan.
name: Houjouin Seika
